## recursiveGetMetadata() function

Recursively retrieves metadata from a container by traversing the prototype chain.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function recursiveGetMetadata(container: IContainer, metadataKey: any, target: any, _propertyKey?: string | symbol): any[];
```
